entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 6:00 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: WSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
